Go for Mechanical Engineering! you will have very close relationships with your teachers and they will change your view of school for the good.

This is the happiest I have been attending school in my entire life. I dont believe I will ever find the experience Ive had at any other college. The teachers in my department are the best and will do anything for you to help out.

textAfterTable: Dorm Life here at Pitt we dont have dorm room.. Life as a bulldog can be hectic especially we you are taking 5 classes during one semester while working full time! Academic Rigor to transfer you must recieve C's or higher to transfer to a university , we have some of the best instructors and staff, who are willing to help their students to the best of their ability Tips for prospective students Plan Ahead , dont procrastinate about any matter whether its your classes, homework, financial aid, etc. keep your focus and pace yourself, just because you dont get it the first time, try ....try again with Gods help you will make it . keep in contact with your advisor, and instructors , make sure you are up to par with your GPA and credits for graduation.! In three sentences Pitt Community College is a student friendly school, where the student is first in mind, its the home of the mighty bulldogs, founded in 1961 , their goals are : student &community access, student access, and program excellence.
